column3: School of Aerospace, Civil, Electrical And Mechanical Engineering
column5: Engineers and technical graduates have the potential to reach the pinnacle of management and leadership.Through external consultation with business and industry, this MSc in Engineering Leadership and Management has been designed to equip you with the vital graduate skills needed to succeed in an engineering management or leadership role.The Engineering Leadership and Management programme has been developed jointly by the School of Management and the College of Engineering. Students on the programme will benefit from being taught by both Management and Engineering academics, and will be able to take advantage of the facilities within both faculties.
column7: Please visit our website for the Engineering Leadership and Management course fee information.
